category-extras-0.53.6: Various modules and constructs inspired by category theoryContentsIndex
Control.Category.Hask
Portabilityportable
Stabilityexperimental
MaintainerEdward Kmett <ekmett@gmail.com>
Description
Make it clearer when we are dealing with the category (->) that we mean the category of haskell types via its Hom bifunctor (->)
Documentation
type Hask = (->)
Produced by Haddock version 2.1.0
